dc:title: Wonderful Adventures
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Acceptance speech for the Gandhi Award. Compares the depression of the '70s and '30s and believes the '70s was worse due to government regulations which hindered people from helping themselves. However in happy to see the youth getting back to the land and the peace movement growing.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 139 1975-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
